# sivirep

*sivirep* provides functions for data wrangling and automated reports from _SIVIGILA_ source.

## Installation
You can install the development version of _sivirep_ from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("epiverse-trace/sivirep")
```

## Quick start

To view the list of diseases available to make a report with `sivirep`:

```{r example}
library(sivirep)

list_of_diseases <- list_avaliable_diseases_and_years()
list_of_diseases
```
